snippet.title: Synergy of Serra || Teaser Trailer || Game Mechanics
snippet.description:
🤩
𝗦𝘆𝗻𝗲𝗿𝗴𝘆 𝗼𝗳 𝗦𝗲𝗿𝗿𝗮 𝗶𝘀 𝗮 𝗱𝗲𝗰𝗸𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗰𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗴𝗮𝗺𝗲. 
It will pioneer this new card game genre by merging the collectibility and customization of classic Trading Card Games with the infinite replayability of Deckbuilder Card Games. 

This video previews the game mechanics of Synergy of Serra. Its purpose is to give gamers an idea of how Synergy of Serra is played and an indication of what Synergy of Serra could look like in-game.

Images and effects in the video are subject to change and do not represent actual gameplay.

Warning: Flashing images. It may not be suitable for photosensitive epilepsy.

𝗟𝗲𝗮𝗿𝗻 𝗺𝗼𝗿𝗲 👇

🌐 Our website -
https://synergyofserra.com

📖 The Compendium of Serra -
https://synergyofserra.gitbook.io/the-compendium-of-serra/
